english.segment1: So what I'm not your average girl. I don't meet the standards of this world. Chasing after boys is not my thing. See I'm waiting for a wedding ring
english.segment2: Chorus. No more dating. I'm just waiting. Like sleeping beauty. My prince will come for me. No more dating. I'm just waiting. 'Cause God is writing my love story
english.segment3: Boys are bad; that's certainly not true. 'Cause God's preparing one for you. If you get tired waiting till he comes. God's arms are the perfect place to run
english.segment5: Bridge. Sleep - that's the only thing for me. 'Cause when I sleep . God's preparing one for me
